title: Production API Improvements
description:
Enhance the Consoul server API with production-ready features for enterprise deployments.

**Goals:**
- Improve API discoverability and client compatibility
- Add robust error handling with standardized codes
- Implement resilience patterns for LLM provider failures
- Support diverse client requirements (SSE, batch, webhooks)
- Document multi-tenancy and performance patterns

**Scope:**
- P0: OpenAPI schema improvements, SSE streaming endpoint
- P1: Error code catalog, batch endpoint, circuit breaker, multi-tenancy docs
- P2: API key rotation, connection pooling docs, load testing, webhooks

**Success Criteria:**
- OpenAPI spec accurately reflects all endpoints and schemas
- Clients without WebSocket support can use streaming via SSE
- Standardized error codes enable consistent client error handling
- Circuit breaker prevents cascading failures during LLM outages
- Documentation enables secure, performant production deployments
